channel.title: YouTube on Tobyblog
channel.description: Recent content in YouTube on Tobyblog

item.title: Today's Sounds: It's Possible
item.description: Forever remind yourself. The comments section on this video describes it as 70’s Italian cocaine lounge music. Psychedelia. Dunno, but I like it. I suppose this goes out to all you folks tripping today in Oregon.

item.title: Garth Alper — Stratus
item.description: This is the guy that taught me and Kass to appreciate jazz, literally. He was our old jazz and music appreciation professor in college. On a couple of occasions we went to see him and his band play around town. Neat guy, and some people said we kind of resembled each other. I always found this sound makes for good study music. This is his third album, I believe, and it’s pretty strong.

item.title: Music From Empty Malls
item.description: My working playlist for today. Makes me think about remoting from the old Collin Creek mall. I miss that place.

item.title: Happy Birthday, Curtis Mayfield. RIP
item.description: I’m afraid we’re all out of Curtis Mayfields.

item.title: Cover Battle — Killing in the Name
item.description: Recent events got me resurrecting an old feature of the site that I’ve neglected far too long. Today’s YouTube cover battle features Rage Against the Machine’s “Killing in the Name."

item.title: Unbelievable: Real or Bullshit? Question Supercut
item.description: Answer these questions in the comments, then forward this blog to 10 of your friends (assuming you have 10 friends).
